example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (IP-CND (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 做成) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (CC 又) (VP (VA 大)) (CC 又) (VP (VA 均匀)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 陶器)))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 需要) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 很)) (VP (VA 好)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 技术))))))
